summary: REQ-16 (update Contact section email text to exactly "thegoldenneedle07") appears to be implemented per the repository summary, but the provided ContactSection.tsx diff is truncated before the contact info rendering, so the exact email string and whether `text-muted-foreground` styling is preserved cannot be fully verified from the snippet. Additionally, ContactSection.tsx includes unrequested form-behavior changes (validation, success state), and non-requested metadata/state files were modified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Preserve the existing muted styling for the email display (same `text-muted-foreground` styling) while updating the email text to exactly "thegoldenneedle07".
missing_requirements.reason: The diff excerpt for `ContactSection.tsx` is truncated before the contact information card rendering, so the exact className/styling used for the email text cannot be confirmed from the provided evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: No other contact fields (phone numbers, location, form fields) are changed.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows changes to the contact form behavior (new validation logic, error state, submission success UI, timer-based reset), which constitutes changes beyond only updating the displayed email text.

hallucinated_features.description: Added client-side form validation with per-field error messages (Name/Phone-or-email/Message required).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to update the displayed email text; it explicitly said no other contact fields should be changed.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a post-submit success/thank-you state with a CheckCircle icon and automatic form reset after 3 seconds.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; this alters contact form behavior beyond changing the displayed email.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified `frontend-file-summaries.txt` to describe updated contact details and other site features.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-16; appears to be ancillary documentation/state update rather than the requested email text change.
Not requested by REQ-16; appears unrelated to the single UI text change requested.
